abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders wins West Virginia's Democratic primary, forcing Hillary Clinton to focus on clinching party nomination and challenging Donald J Trump in general election; Sandsers vows to stay in racing, compelling Clinton to move to left.
lead_paragraph: The primary victory by the senator from Vermont will force his Democratic rival to continue a distracting nominating fight.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Wins West Virginia, Prolonging Race With Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: Sanders Takes West Virginia, Pulling Clinton Left as Race Goes On

snippet: The primary victory by the senator from Vermont will force his Democratic rival to continue a distracting nominating fight....
